question: Who of the following conferred with the best Sportsperson of the Year Award by the Sports Journalists Federation of India?
explanation: The Sports Journalists Federation of India, at its annual general meeting decided to confer the best Sportsperson of the Year Award on the ace shuttler and Rio Olympics silver medallist P V Sindhu. The Best Team of the Year award was bagged by the Indian junior hockey squad which won the World Cup in Lucknow last December.
